entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Coral Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:41 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -40.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coral Harbour Airport 01:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -40.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -50
Dewpoint: -44.0°C
Wind: NNW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 43. Wind chill minus 60 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 8:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 36. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 51 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 8:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 36. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 36. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 8:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
